    • Uses of PercolateRequest in org.elasticsearch.action.percolate

      Methods in org.elasticsearch.action.percolate that return PercolateRequest 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected PercolateRequest PercolateRequestBuilder.beforeExecute(PercolateRequest request) 
      PercolateRequest PercolateRequest.documentType(String type)
      Sets the type of the document to percolate.
      PercolateRequest PercolateRequest.getRequest(GetRequest getRequest)
      This defines where to fetch the document to be percolated from, which is an alternative of defining the document to percolate in the request body.
      PercolateRequest PercolateRequest.onlyCount(boolean onlyCount)
      Sets whether this percolate request should only count the number of percolator queries that matches with the document being percolated and don't keep track of the actual queries that have matched.
      PercolateRequest PercolateRequest.preference(String preference)
      Sets the preference to execute the search.
      PercolateRequest PercolateRequestBuilder.request() 
      PercolateRequest PercolateRequest.routing(String routing)
      A comma separated list of routing values to control the shards the search will be executed on.
